stories.body:
北方冷空氣南下，今天台灣附近為東北季風環境，中央氣象署說，迎風面 桃園 以北及東半部地區高溫稍降1、2度左右，約落在31、32度，其他地區影響不大，仍有33到35度的高溫，尤其苗栗局部地區有36度高溫發生的機率。  中午前後紫外線偏強，外出請做好防曬並多補充水分，夜晚清晨低溫約為25、26度。
 天氣方面，今天桃園以北、東半部地區及 恆春 半島整天不定時有局部陣雨，東北部地區要留意有局部較大雨勢的機會，其他地區為多雲到晴，午後有局部短暫雷陣雨，建議外出攜帶雨具備用。
  桃園至嘉義、東半部（含蘭嶼、綠島）、恆春半島沿海空曠地區及澎湖、金門、馬祖將有8至9級強陣風。
  明天之前適逢天文大潮，新北至雲林沿海低窪地區及澎金馬於漲潮期間需注意防範海水倒灌。
  氣象署表示，今年第14號輕度 颱風 小犬，今天凌晨2時中心距離鵝鑾鼻東南東方約1160公里，以每小時16公里速度，向北北西進行。
  明天之前輕度颱風小犬大致以北北西或西北方向行進，周二開始往西分量才明顯增加，其影響台灣程度和明天前偏北程度有關，路徑仍有不確定性，若較偏北行進，北部、東半部地區及中部山區降雨會較為顯著，但若路徑較為偏南，降雨以東半部及南部地區為主。
  明天、周二東北季風影響，明天基隆北海岸、東半部地區及恆春半島有零星短暫陣雨，下半天北方乾涼空氣致使雨勢較為趨緩，桃園以北地區為短暫陣雨後多雲，其他地區為多雲到晴，午後南部地區及中部山區有局部短暫雷陣雨。
  周二則有颱風外圍沉降作用，水氣更加減少，各地為多雲到晴，僅東半部地區及恆春半島有零星短暫陣雨，午後南部地區及中部山區有局部短暫雷陣雨。
  周三至周五是小犬颱風影響台灣最明顯的時間點，受颱風或其外圍環流影響，基隆北海岸、東半部地區及恆春半島有陣雨，並有局部大雨發生的機率，北部、南部地區及中部山區有局部短暫陣雨，其他地區為多雲。
  周六颱風外圍環流影響，基隆北海岸、東半部地區及恆春半島有短暫陣雨，北部、南部地區及中部山區有局部短暫陣雨，其他地區為多雲。
  周四、周五南部、東南部（含蘭嶼、綠島）、恆春半島沿海及澎湖、金門易有長浪發生。
  10月8日至10日北部及東半部地區有局部短暫陣雨，其他地區為多雲到晴，午後有局部短暫雷陣雨。

  udn討論區

stories.body:
未來3個月為台灣秋季及初冬時期，中央 氣象署 發布季長期天氣展望，「報氣候 - 中央氣象署」臉書粉專表示，10月至12月由秋季進入冬季，受東北季風影響，各地氣溫會隨著季節轉換逐漸下降，迎風面的北部、東北部偶有短暫雨，中南部進入氣候上的枯水期。
 中央氣象署預測未來一季，氣溫方面，各地氣溫隨著季節的轉換而逐漸下降。 雨量 方面，迎風面的東北部及北部偶有短暫雨；因中央山脈地形屏障效應，中南部進入氣候上的枯水期。
  另一方面，10月至12月北太平洋西部海域仍有颱風生成的機會，氣象署說，平均10月和11月分別有3.5個和2.2個颱風形成，12月仍有1.0個颱風形成。
  展望10月至12月未來一季，氣象署說，動力及統計模式對於未來一季台灣附近的氣溫為正常至偏暖，12月的偏暖機率大。雨量方面，動力及統計模式皆認為未來一季12月雨量相較10、11月偏多機率較高。海溫方面，雖熱帶中東太平洋海溫明顯偏暖，但由於赤道太平洋西風距平尚未明顯發展，因此偏暖海溫是否持續升溫仍需後續觀察。
  10月：預測第2周有北方系統影響，雨量偏多的機率較高，其餘時間預測各地大多為多雲到晴、午後有局部短暫雷陣雨的天氣為主。預測平均氣溫各地以「接近」氣候正常值的機會最大；雨量預測，以「接近」氣候正常值的機會最大。
  11月：氣候上屬東北季風型天氣，但模式預測台灣位在偏乾的環境，預測月平均氣溫各地以「接近」氣候正常值的機會最大；雨量預測，各地少於、接近、多於氣候正常值的機率為30%、50%、20%。
  12月：氣候上大陸冷高壓逐漸發展，模式有偏濕的訊號，預測月平均氣溫各地以「接近」氣候正常值的機會最大；雨量預測，各地少於、接近、多於氣候正常值的機率為20%、50%、30%。

en.body:
In the three months of the year and early winter, the Central Huxing Department has a long-term outlook, and "Hungju-Current-Current-Current" said that from October to December, the winter was affected by the Tohoku season, and the
Central D. C. . . . . . has not been measured for a season, the slings of the season, the side of the slings, the fall. Rainfall, the wind-to-be north and north side have short rain; Due to the central mountain ridge barrier, the south of the south advanced into the sulfur period.
On the other hand, there are still silt - produced silts in the North Pacific Seas between October and December, according to the Department. Five and two. Two squats formed and there were still 1.1 in December. 00 stomps formed.
Looking forward to the coming October-December season, the DA said the dynamic and statistical model was normal to warm up near the cylinx, and the December heat was high. In terms of rain, the dynamics and statistics models are considered to be relatively high in December and November. The sea sling, the mid-range Pacific Ocean, but is not yet clear from the western Pacific Ocean, so whether the horn is still in need of a snorkel.
October 2: The northern section of the week has been estimated to have a relatively high frequency of rain, and its time is often measured for the sun and the afternoons of some of the short-range thunderstorms. The maximum chance of "close" normal value of the average scalar is measured. The maximum chance of rain is to "close" to normal values.
November: The mood is in the north-east, but the model of the squat is in a dry environment, and the maximum chance of "close" normal value is measured around the average month. Rainstorms estimate that the rate of low, near and more normal is 30 percent, 50% and 20 percent.
December: The cold-sweeping of the continent is on the rise, the model of the silt, and the largest chance of "close" normal value is measured in the average month. Rainstorms estimate that the chance rate of less, closer and more than 20%, 50% and 30 percent of normal values.

stories.body:
今天清晨5點多 嘉義 市區傳火警，嘉義市消防局出動人車前往灌救，火勢在6點多撲滅，消防人員於火場中搜救1名婦人，呈現OHCA，沒有生命跡象，送往醫院搶救。火警原因調查中。  市消防局表示，今天清晨5點45分，據報在市區公明路有處 透天厝 傳出火警，第二分隊小隊長率第二、東區、第一分隊前往搶救，雖然火勢在15分鐘後撲滅，但消防人員於屋內搜救出一名婦人，呈現沒有呼吸與心跳的OHCA現象，送醫搶救。

stories.body:
La Secretaría de Protección Civil (PC) del estado de Veracruz , que encabeza Guadalupe Osorno Maldonado, convocó a participar en el Tercer Congreso Internacional de Gestión Integral del Riesgo de Desastres Veracruz
 La invitación es para integrantes del Sistema Estatal de Protección Civil , grupos voluntarios, organizaciones privadas, civiles y académicas, así como al público en general que tenga interés en el tema.
  Podrán registrarse en el sitio o escribir al correo congresoveracruzgir@gmail.com para solicitar mayor información.
  Sobre el Congres de Gestión de Riesgos
  Dicho congreso se realizará del 2 al 6 de octubre con la participación de especialistas de 11 países.
  Se inaugurará el lunes 2 de octubre a las 12:00 horas a través de la plataforma FB Live en las redes sociales de PC, y durante cinco días se desarrollará con sesiones virtuales de mesas de conferencias y foros de experiencias, así como talleres virtuales y presenciales.
  Esta edición contará con la presencia de especialistas de Perú, Argentina, El Salvador, Nicaragua, Colombia, Ecuador, España, Honduras, Paraguay, Italia y España.
  Quienes compartirán sus conocimientos y experiencias en materia de gestión y reducción del riesgo, detalló la dependencia estatal a través de comunicado.

sentences:
La Secretaría de Protección Civil (PC) del estado de Veracruz , que encabeza Guadalupe Osorno Maldonado, convocó a participar en el Tercer Congreso Internacional de Gestión Integral del Riesgo de Desastres Veracruz
 La invitación es para integrantes del Sistema Estatal de Protección Civil , grupos voluntarios, organizaciones privadas, civiles y académicas, así como al público en general que tenga interés en el tema.

Se inaugurará el lunes 2 de octubre a las 12:00 horas a través de la plataforma FB Live en las redes sociales de PC, y durante cinco días se desarrollará con sesiones virtuales de mesas de conferencias y foros de experiencias, así como talleres virtuales y presenciales.

Sobre el Congres de Gestión de Riesgos
  Dicho congreso se realizará del 2 al 6 de octubre con la participación de especialistas de 11 países.
Esta edición contará con la presencia de especialistas de Perú, Argentina, El Salvador, Nicaragua, Colombia, Ecuador, España, Honduras, Paraguay, Italia y España.
Quienes compartirán sus conocimientos y experiencias en materia de gestión y reducción del riesgo, detalló la dependencia estatal a través de comunicado.

stories.title: Invita SPC Veracruz a congreso de Gestión Integral de Riesgo

en.body:
The State Civil Protection Secretariat (PC) of Veracruz, headed by Guadalupe Osorno Maldonado, invited to participate in the Third International Congress on Integrated Management of the Disaster Risk of Veracruz.
The invitation is for members of the State Civil Protection System , voluntary groups, private, civil and academic organizations, as well as the general public who is interested in the issue.
You can register on the site or write to the congressoveracruzgir@gmail.com to request more information.
On the Congress on Risk Management
This conference will take place from 2 to 6 October with the participation of specialists from 11 countries.
It will open on Monday, October 2, at 12:00 hours through the RB Live platform on the social networks of PC, and will be developed for five days with virtual conference tables and for-profit forums, as well as virtual and presence workshops.
This edition will include experts from Peru, Argentina, El Salvador, Nicaragua, Colombia, Ecuador, Spain, Honduras, Paraguay, Italy and Spain.
Those who share their knowledge and experience in risk management and reduction detail state dependence through communication.
en.title: Invite SPC Veracruz to the Intergovernmental Management Congress of Risk

stories.body:
LaDarius Owens and Jacorey Howard had first-quarter touchdown runs and Texas Southern never looked back, picking up its first win of the year with a 52-7 victory over Division II-member Lincoln (CA)
 HOUSTON (AP) — LaDarius Owens and Jacorey Howard had first-quarter touchdown runs and Texas Southern never looked back, picking up its first win of the year with a 52-7 victory over Division II-member Lincoln (CA) on Saturday.
  Howard scored on a 36-yard run in the second quarter to put the Tigers (1-4) up 21-0. Lincoln got on the scoreboard with 16 seconds left in the period, using Khibo Norfleet's 10-yard touchdown run to pull with 14 at halftime.

 HOUSTON (AP) — LaDarius Owens and Jacorey Howard had first-quarter touchdown runs and Texas Southern never looked back, picking up its first win of the year with a 52-7 victory over Division II-member Lincoln (CA) on Saturday.

stories.title: National

stories.body:
继2021年推出首款“Ray-Ban Stories”智慧眼镜后，脸书母公司 Meta于今年的Meta Connect 开发者大会上，除发表最新一代的 Quest 3头戴式装置之外，同时还推出了携手雷朋眼镜母公司 EssilorLuxottica 合作研发的第二款AR 智慧眼镜。
 据报导，新品不但改采用以“Ray-Ban Meta”智慧眼镜系列作为命名，而且还带来了IPX4防水、镜头升级为1200万画素（可录製影片或于FB、IG即时直播）以及录製空间音讯等五大进化改良的升级。 功能则是诉求在解放双手的无负担下，可用第一人称的视角录製1080P影片和照片于FB、IG社交媒体分享，并支援Meta AI 语音助理声控功能（初期仅限美国测试上线）。 全新亮相的新一代“Ray-Ban Meta”智慧眼镜，机身外观设计乍看下和前代颇为相似，不过在眼镜佩戴的重量、镜架与镜脚等细节与功能，作了进一步的微调。
  镜框则提供方型Ray-Ban Wayfarer、与方圆形的Headliner 两种复古风格选择，颜色则有哑光黑、闪亮黑，以及新增的三种牛仔蓝、叛逆黑与焦糖色的透明镜框：另，亦可于雷朋官网上订製超过150种的镜框和镜片混搭组合个人喜爱的眼镜造型。
  售价则仍维持和前代一致的299美元，即日起于Meta官网与雷朋官网开放预购，预计在10月17日起于美国、英国、德国、法国、意大利等15个国家上市。

categories.label: Trading Impact (ICE Codes) Important Corporate Events

sentences:
Following the launch of the first "Ray-Ban Stories" smart glasses in 2021, Meta, the facebook company, at this year’s Meta Connect developers’ conference, launched the second ART-based smart lens, which co-produced by Rey-Ban Stries, and the
The new product was reported to have been not only named "Ray-Ban Meta" as a series of smart glasses, but also brought about five major improvements in the five- evolved features such as IPC4 waterproof water, the camera upgrade to 12 million
The new generation of "Ray-Ban Meta" smart glasses, designed to look like the previous generation, but made further micro-controlling of the weight, lens and foot features.

The mirror box provides a square Ray-Ban Wayfarer, with a square Headliner two re-styled options, with a dark, shiny black color, and a new three-piece blue, raspberry and coke-colored transparent mirror: another, with a 
The price of the sale, which is still consistent with previous generations, is expected to open with Meta-Tunnet, which is expected to be listed in 15 countries such as the United States, the United Kingdom, Germany, France and Italy on October 17.
The function is to use the free handless charge of the first person to make 1080 P films and photos on FB, IG social media, and support Meta AI voice support (initially only on the US test line).

stories.title: 5大升级，Meta推新一代AR智慧眼镜

en.body:
Following the launch of the first "Ray-Ban Stories" smart glasses in 2021, Meta, the facebook company, at this year’s Meta Connect developers’ conference, launched the second ART-based smart lens, which co-produced by Rey-Ban Stries, and the
The new product was reported to have been not only named "Ray-Ban Meta" as a series of smart glasses, but also brought about five major improvements in the five- evolved features such as IPC4 waterproof water, the camera upgrade to 12 million  The function is to use the free handless charge of the first person to make 1080 P films and photos on FB, IG social media, and support Meta AI voice support (initially only on the US test line). The new generation of "Ray-Ban Meta" smart glasses, designed to look like the previous generation, but made further micro-controlling of the weight, lens and foot features.
The mirror box provides a square Ray-Ban Wayfarer, with a square Headliner two re-styled options, with a dark, shiny black color, and a new three-piece blue, raspberry and coke-colored transparent mirror: another, with a 
The price of the sale, which is still consistent with previous generations, is expected to open with Meta-Tunnet, which is expected to be listed in 15 countries such as the United States, the United Kingdom, Germany, France and Italy on October 17.
en.title: Meta's new generation of AR smart glasses.

stories.body:
Posts:  Forum Member  ✭✭  Hope someone can help me.  When I logged into FB this morning, a pop-up appeared saying "Facebook have removed some of your content".
 That is all, nothing else. Dont know what they removed or why.
  I cannot get rid of this pop-up - when I click on the X, nothing happens. It's like I am locked out for some reason. If anyone knows how I can get rid of this pop-up and hopefully use FB again, that would be fab, and I hope its an easy fix, as I'm not that great with stuff like this.
  Posts:
  Forum Member
  ✭✭
  Trying logging out then logging back in again?

sentences: Posts:  Forum Member  ✭✭  Hope someone can help me.

When I logged into FB this morning, a pop-up appeared saying "Facebook have removed some of your content".
If anyone knows how I can get rid of this pop-up and hopefully use FB again, that would be fab, and I hope its an easy fix, as I'm not that great with stuff like this.

stories.title: Facebook problem!

stories.body:
出身「大圈仔」的國寶集團總裁 朱國榮 違反證券交易法等2案，分別遭處16年、8年徒刑，案件上訴三審期間，70歲的朱放棄5億元保證金逃亡，台灣高等法院上月28日通緝。法院原裁定朱每晚至台北市三張犁派出所報到，朱上月8日即未現身，信義分局遲至12日深夜11點55分才通知法警。要犯逃了誰該負責？所長陳韋勲雖調職，爭議才開始蔓延。
 羈押對侵害被告人身自由甚嚴重，實務上可採交保、責付、限制住居等替代方式確保被告日後到庭接受審判、執行，刑事訴訟法第116條之2第1項第1款即有「定期向法院、檢察官或指定之機關報到」的規定。「定期」則依案件情節而報到頻率不同，例如被當「共諜」審理的陸籍人士周泓旭，台北地院就裁定他每周一到派出所報到，毆打立委高嘉瑜的林秉樞，則是每天都得到派出所。
  朱國榮脫逃後，有員警發牢騷「難道1個月後發現潛逃也要怪 警察 ？」，還說即便每日報到，有意潛逃簽到後有24小時可逃亡，認為法院應檢討電子設備監控。但朱國榮屬「每日報到」的要犯，三張犁派出所遲了5天才通報，比起有其他派出所員警在報到人簽到時，拍照傳LINE給所長確認的管理方式，明顯鬆散、有疏失，懲處不能與「逃不逃得了」混為一談、畫上等號。
  逃亡海外要有人、有交通工具接應，還要有在海外生活的本事，所費不貲，不是每個被告都是朱國榮般腰纏萬貫，到「指定機關」報到仍有一定程度功效。朱國榮號稱「身價百億」，他捨5億保證金換取餘生自由，警方遲了5天才通報法院，難杜民眾有縱放或耍詭串通之疑。
  但依台灣「凡事丟給警察」的習性，讓警察的業務包山包海，過去警政署主張廢除被告到派出所報到的不成文規定，「調度 司法 警察條例」彷彿讓司法機關拿到「業務協助條例的空白支票」，也被認為不符時空環境。法務部則認為調度司法警察條例是為確保刑事訴訟程序正確運行，避免組織上無隸屬的檢、警無法貫徹偵查分工。
  刑事被告科技設備監控執行辦法2020年才上路，在此之前交保的被告如何要求「依指定之時間及地點接受監控設備之配戴」是一大問題，突然回頭要求他們去特定地點配戴電子腳鐐，有強制、侵犯人身自由疑慮，也可能間接暴露法官心證。依實務來看，未來要如何讓法官、檢察官願意擴大使用科控設備才是亡羊補牢之法，經朱案教訓，預料被掛上電子腳鐐、電子手環的被告會「越來越多」。
  相關新聞
  商品推薦
  FB留言
  udn討論區
  共 則留言

stories.body:
Josi García Moreno es la hermana menor de Charly García. Está harta y triste por las cosas que se dicen de la familia del querido músico, que
hace tiempo está unida por primera vez en muchos años para apoyarlo, todos alineados y en constante comunicación. Se refiere a su cuñada Mecha Iñigo, su hermano Daniel
  Josi García Moreno es la hermana menor de Charly García . Está harta y triste por las cosas que se dicen de la familia del querido músico, que hace tiempo está unida por primera vez en muchos años para apoyarlo, todos alineados y en constante comunicación. Se refiere a su cuñada Mecha Iñigo, su hermano Daniel, su sobrino Migue, y sus propios hijos y demás sobrinos.
  Quiere hablar, Pidió hablar. Lo propuso en el grupo de chat familiar llamado como el apodo cariñoso de Mecha hacia Charly, y no le hicieron mayores objeciones. Se puso en contacto con Clarín y por primera vez habló públicamente sobre la salud de su hermano y el rol de toda la familia.
  Hoy, a ocho años de su último álbum'y a dos de su último recital, Charly García sigue estando en las noticias y no por motivos musicales . El mes pasado hubo preocupación entre los fans por una internación en un sanatorio , y a principios de 2022 sufrió quemaduras por un accidente hogareño . En cada caso circularon rumores de todo tipo y luego apenas alguna foto en la cuenta oficial @charlygarcia para dar tranquilidad.
  En la semana pasada, tras los polémicos posteos y declaraciones poco felices de músicos como Fernando Samalea y Fabiana Cantilo , en las redes sociales apareció el hashtag #FreeCharly y se publicaron opiniones que comparaban su estado actual a episodios trágicos de Britney Spears o incluso Diego Maradona.
  Samalea, por ejemplo, tiró la primera piedra con un impulsivo texto en su cuenta de Facebook que luego eliminó, pero ya había hecho todo el daño posible: alimentó a los malpensados y malintencionados.
  Charly García en su último concierto, el día de su cumpleaños en el CCK, en 2021. Foto: IG @charlygarcia«Lamentablemente somos demasiados los músicos amigos de Charly a los cuales se nos impide verlo. Ojalá eso cambie pronto. Lo queremos bien, contento y libre, unido a la música, que es lo que más ama,» escribió..
  Fabi, por su parte, en muchos reportajes promocionales de sus actuales shows en el Gran Rex, respondió a preguntas sobre Charly y sin pudor dio detalles íntimos de cuándo se conocieron y declaró «No me lo dejan ver».
  En ese contexto, más la multiplicación de fans enojados en la puerta del célebre edificio donde vive Charly, llegó el pedido de nota de Josi García Moreno.
  Habla la hermana de Charly
  Josi García Moreno es profesora de canto. Aquí en vivo junto a Juan Absatz, tecladista de Fito Páez. Foto: FB«Charly está con tratamiento y con kinesiólogo todos los días,» comienza Josi. «No quiero hablar de eso porque me parece que él tiene derecho a contar lo que quiera contar. Yo lo voy a ver, le aviso Migue que estoy ahí, sube dos pisos y tomamos la leche todos juntos. Estamos ahí, cuidándolo y acompañándolo para que se recupere «.
  Y agrega: «Lo molesto es que digan que somos un ‘entorno'. ¡Somos la familia y estamos acompañándolo! También es molesto que ciertas personas salieron a decir cosas, y ya Charly llamó a algunos y tuvo su intercambio de palabras. Cualquiera que haya ido a los cumpleaños o a verlo últimamente, como David Lebón, Fito Páez, Hilda, León o los Ortega, saben que estamos y que no estamos pre-ocupados sino que estamos ocupados , ocupándonos de ayudarlo».
  La familia, unida
  «Durante mucho tiempo Charly no quería saber nada ni con la familia ni con nadie, porque hacía la vida que hacía y en mi caso yo hacía otra vida muy distinta. Intentamos vernos y no salió. Pero Charly, en algún momento, por las circunstancias que todo el mundo conoce, tuvo que cambiar de vida. Y todos nos hicimos más grandes,» explica su hermana menor, cuyo apodo fue puesto por Charly cuando nació.
  Y da más detalles: «Mecha también ayudó para que nos volvamos a ver, y yo terminé viéndolo bastante, después de muchos años. Estuve en cada visita de los médicos, cada internación y cada cumpleaños. Incluso el mío lo pasé en lo de Charly mirando el Mundial. Estoy para lo que haga falta, incluso para ir a un acto de SADAIC con Mecha hace un mes, porque Charly no estaba como para andar moviéndose tanto y no tiene ganas».
  El 31 de agosto de este año, SADAIC nombró Socio Honorario a músicos como Charly García y Emilio Del Guercio, aquí junto a Josi García Moreno y Mecha Iñigo. Foto gentileza JGMRevuelve el café en un pequeño bar de la calle Tacuarí, se seca unas lágrimas y continúa : «No voy a hablar por él. Lo que sí te puedo decir es que hace muchos cumpleaños que estamos todos juntos. Hace mucho que nos hablamos todos, y hace mucho que tenemos un grupo de familia en Whatsapp. Él no hablaba con mi mamá hace años, y si bien ella ahora no está en condiciones, gracias a Mecha también empezó a hablar por teléfono con mi vieja».
  Volver a grabar y tocar
  Como bien dice Josi, «Charly no tiene 30 años, no hizo la vida de un deportista y ahora no puede hacer lo que se le cante. Sin embargo la semana pasada volvió al estudio de grabación . Quiso volver y volvió. Pero todo es a medida que lo vaya viendo. Ojalá pueda salir a tocar rapidísimo. Pero no es un niño y estamos todos laburando para lo mismo, desde los médicos, la psiquiatra y nosotros. Estamos todos ahí, tratando de sumar, con Mecha a la cabeza».
  La última foto en la cuenta de Instagram de Charly, el 15 de agosto de este año, cuando volvió a su casa después de una internación por fiebre alta. Foto: IG @charlygarcia -Lo último que se supo fue el famoso chequeo general en agosto.
  -Fue porque tuvo fiebre. ¡Entonces no es que no está cuidado, está recontra cuidado! Fue el médico a la casa, no le bajaba la fiebre y por las dudas lo internaron. Tiene la salud que tiene y está bien, pero nunca sabés, y si tiene fiebre te preguntás qué es. Entonces fue al Instituto del Diagnóstico, que es como su segundo hogar, y se hizo un chequeo general.
  Fuimos con Migue, con Dani, todos, como cualquier familia normal. Solo que cualquier familia normal no tiene que explicar todo. Le sacaron sangre, le hicieron resonancia y listo, se acabó la historia. Bajó la fiebre y volvíó a la casa contentísimo.
  -¿De las quemaduras del año pasado le quedaron marcas?
  -Un montón. Tiene muchos injertos en la pierna. Fue un mes y medio que estuvo internado ahí, con curaciones y todo eso. ¡Justo a una cuadra de donde está mi madre! Estaría bueno que todos los que arman la bola y dicen que aman a Charly, lo amen de verdad y lo vayan a ver. Nito fue a verlo, por ejemplo. No avisó a nadie, fue y lo vio.
  -¿Cuál es la situación de la cadera, no hizo una rehabilitación buena ?
  -¿Cómo no va a hacer rehabilitación? No es eso. Es un tipo muy grandote. Para que cualquier persona salga caminando, tiene que estar todo el tiempo, y él lo hizo hasta que se volvió a caer. La cadera fue el primer paso a esta situación de depender de otros. No puede levantarse siquiera a hacerse un café, entonces va pidiendo lo que necesita.
  Yo llego y me pide «Ey, sandwichito”, porque le gusta lo que le preparo. Está bueno que esté con alegría y buen humor, porque la idea es que él esté genial y cuanto antes se pueda levantar más y tocar más el piano. Es la idea de todos los que lo queremos bien. Pero para eso hay que sumar y estar a disposición.
  -¿Leíste lo último que se publico sobre él?
  -No leí la nota. Está clarísimo que no estoy contestando a ninguna nota porque no la leí. Sólo vi la tapa porque me la mandó mi hijo. Me amargué mucho.
  Continue Reading
  Previous Sofía Clerici blanqueó su romance con Martín Insaurralde desde un exclusivo yate en Marbella

Se refiere a su cuñada Mecha Iñigo, su hermano Daniel

Está harta y triste por las cosas que se dicen de la familia del querido músico, que
hace tiempo está unida por primera vez en muchos años para apoyarlo, todos alineados y en constante comunicación.

stories.title: Qué pasa con la salud de Charly García, habla por primera vez su hermana: «Está cuidado por toda la familia y recuperándose»

en.body:
Josi García Moreno is Charlie García's younger sister. He's bitter and sad about the things that are said about the family of the music dear, who
It has been united for the first time in many years to support it, all of them aligned and in constant communication. It's about your cousin Mecha Iñigo, your brother Daniel
Josi García Moreno is Charlie García's younger sister , and she is bitter and sad about what is said about the family of the music favorite, who has long been united for the first time in many years to support him, all of them in line and in constant communication. It refers to his cousin Mecha Iñigo, his brother Daniel, his nephew Migue, and his own children and other Suburbs.
He wants to talk, he asked to speak. He proposed it in the family chat group called Mecha's lovesome friend to Charlie, and did not object to him. He was in contact with Clarin and for the first time publicly talked about the health of his brother and the role of the whole family.
Today, eight years of his last album' and two of his last recitation, Charlie García is still in the news and not on musical grounds . Last month there was concern among fans for an international in a sanatorium, and in early 2022, Charlie García was case of all kinds of rumors circulated and then just a few photos on the official @charlygarcia account to give peace.
Last week, following the controversial posts and statements from musicians such as Fernando Samuela and Fabiana Cantilo , the hashtag #FreeCharly appeared and opinions were published comparing their current status to the tragic episodes of Britoni Spears or Mar 1999.
Somalea, for example, took the first stone with a shaming text on her Facebook account that then removed it, but had already done all the damage possible: it fed the maleducated and malthought.
Charlie García at his last concert, the day of his birthday at the CCK, in 2021. Photo: IG @charlygarcia “We are unfortunately too many of Charlie’s musical friends to stop us from seeing. I wish that would change soon. We want it well, happy and free, combined with music, which is what we love most," he wrote.
Fabi, for his part, in many promotional reports of his current shows in the Grand Rex, answered questions about Charlie and without a powder gave in-depth details of when they met and said, "Don't let me see it."
In this context, more fans angry at the door of the famous building where Charlie lives came Josi García Moreno's request for a note.
She's talking about Charlie's sister
Josi García Moreno is a singing professor. Here in live alongside Juan Abtz, keyboardist of Fito Páez. Photo: RB “Charly is treated and kinesiologist every day,” Josi starts. "I don't want to talk about that because I think he has the right to count what he wants to tell. I'm going to see him, I warn him that I'm there, he's going to go up two floors and we'll all take the milk together. We are there, taking care of it and accompanying it to recover '.
And he adds, "The trouble is they say we're an 'round'. We are the family and we are accompanying him! It is also annoying that certain people went out to say things, and Charlie already called some and had his exchange of words. Anyone who has gone to the holidays or recently to see him, such as David Lebón, Fito Paez, Hilda, León or the Ortega, know that we are and that we are not pre-occupy but busy, working on helping him.
The family, united
"For a long time Charlie didn't want to know anything about the family or with nobody, because he did the life I did and in my case I was doing another very different life. We tried to see and he didn't go out. But Charlie, at some point, because of the circumstances that everyone knows, had to change life. And we all made us bigger," explains his younger sister, whose support was put on by Charlie when she was born.
And it gives more details: "It also helped us to see again, and I ended up seeing it quite a lot, after many years. I was on every visit by doctors, every international and every birthday. Even my own went through it in Charlie's looking at the World Cup. I am for what is needed, even to go to a SADAIC event with Mecha a month ago, because Charlie was not like walking so much and has no gain.
On August 31, SADAIC named the Honorary Society to musicians like Charlie García and Emilia Del Guercio, here with Josi García Moreno and Mecha Iñigo. Photo courtesy JGMRevuelve coffee in a small bar on Tacuari Street, drys a few tears and continues : "I'm not going to talk about it. What I can tell you is that it's many birthdays that we're all together. We've been talking about it all a long time, and we've had a family group at Whatsapp. He didn't talk to my mother years ago, and although she is not in condition now, thanks to Mecha also started to talk on the phone with my old man."
Go back to writing and playing
As Josi says, "Charly is not 30 years old, did not do a sportsman's life and now he can't do what he sings. But last week he returned to the recording studio and wanted to go back and back. But it's all as long as you see it. I hope I can go out and play very quickly. But he's not a child and we're all working for the same thing, from doctors, psychiatrists and us. We are all there, trying to add, with Mecha to the head.
The last photo on Charlie's Instagram account, August 15, this year, when he returned to his home after a high fever international. Photo: IG @charlygarcia - The last that happened was the famous general check in August.
- It was because he had a fever. It is not that he is not careful, he is careful! He was the doctor at home, he didn't get his fever down and they questioned him. She has health and is fine, but you never know, and if she has fever you ask what it is. Then he went to the Institute of diagnosis, which is like his second home, and a general check was made.
We went with Miguel, with Dani, all like any normal family. Only any normal family does not have to explain everything. They took blood out, they made him sound and ready, the story ended. He dropped the fever and returned to the house very happy.
- Did you have any marks left from the burns of last year?
- A lot. He has many inquisitives on his leg. It was a month and a half that was inside there, with treatments and all that. Just a square where my mother is! It would be good if everyone who stole the ball and said they loved Charlie, really love him and go see him. Nito went to see it, for example. He didn't warn anyone, he went and saw him.
- What is the situation of the cat, did not do a good rehabilitation ?
- How are you not going to recover? That's not it. He's a very big guy. So that anyone goes out walking, he has to be all the time, and he did it until he fell back. The cat was the first step towards this situation of dependence on others. You can't even get up to make a coffee, so you're asking for what you need.
I come and ask for ‘Yes, Sandwicho’, because he likes what I prepare for him. It's good that you're happy and good humor, because the idea is that he's great and as soon as you can get up and play the piano more. It is the idea of all those who want it well. But for that we must add and be available.
- Did you read the last thing about him?
- I didn't read the note. It is clear that I am not responding to any note because I did not read it. I only saw the dress because my son sent it to me. I was very angry.
Continue Reading

en.title: What happens to Charlie García's health, speaks for the first time his sister: 'You are careful with the whole family and recovering'

stories.body:
The age-old saying is that NFL games can't be won on the first play - but evidently, $87,418 can be lost.
 That's the story for Atlanta Falcons fullback Keith Smith, who was given a hefty fine for unnecessary roughness on the opening kickoff in last Sunday's 20-6 loss to the Detroit Lions
  Smith wasn't flagged for the play, but the NFL noticed his use of the helmet on a block against Lions running back Zonovan Knights and opted to cash in.
  Here's a look at the play, with Smith standing in the middle of the screen at the 17-yard line ...
  Smith wasn't the only Falcon fined for unnecessary roughness, as starting linebacker Kaden Elliss lost $16,391.
  Since signing with Atlanta prior to the 2019 season, Smith has played in every game, drawing 28 starts in 69 contests. He's yet to receive a carry or been targeted in the passing game this season.
  The 31-year-old Smith has played in 37 offensive snaps and 55 special teams snaps, which is 18 and 69 percent of Atlanta's season totals.
  A steady presence as a run blocker for the Falcons offense, Smith played 10 snaps on offense against Detroit and 20 on special teams.
  In March, Smith signed a one-year, $2.35 million contract to stay in Atlanta for his 10th professional season and fifth with the Dirty Birds. Smith's fine for the hit against Knight is 3.7 percent of his base contract.
  The Falcons - with Smith poised to play a role in two phases - return to action Sunday in London with a 9:30 a.m. kickoff against the Jacksonville Jaguars.
  This article first appeared on FanNation Falcon Report and was syndicated with permission.
  More must-reads:

  Smith wasn't flagged for the play, but the NFL noticed his use of the helmet on a block against Lions running back Zonovan Knights and opted to cash in.
The 31-year-old Smith has played in 37 offensive snaps and 55 special teams snaps, which is 18 and 69 percent of Atlanta's season totals.
In March, Smith signed a one-year, $2.35 million contract to stay in Atlanta for his 10th professional season and fifth with the Dirty Birds.

stories.title: Watch: Falcons FB Keith Smith Gets Fined $87,000
